Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The application ID of the application producing the record.
Columns.Name: ApplicationId

Columns.Description: The ID of the Spark SQL execution.
Columns.Name: ExecutionId

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the Spark SQL execution started.
Columns.Name: StartTime

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the Spark SQL execution ended.
Columns.Name: EndTime

Columns.Description: The description of the Physical/Logical plan of the Spark SQL execution.
Columns.Name: PhysicalPlanDescription

Columns.Description: Json object containing information on the Spark SQL execution.
Columns.Name: SparkPlanInfo

Columns.Description: The tenant ID of the cluster running the Spark SQL execution.
Columns.Name: ClusterTenantId

Columns.Description: The type of node  running the Spark SQL execution.
Columns.Name: Role

Columns.Description: The DNS name of the cluster running the Spark SQL execution.
Columns.Name: ClusterDnsName

Columns.Description: The region of the cluster running the Spark SQL execution.
Columns.Name: Region

Columns.Description: The IP Address of the node running the Spark SQL execution.
Columns.Name: IpAddress

Columns.Description: The subscription ID of the cluster running the Spark SQL execution.
Columns.Name: UserSubscriptionId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
